summary: Contoso Wireless offers high-speed internet connections with speeds up to 1Gbps and no data caps. It also includes features such as parental controls, secure Wi-Fi, and anti-virus protection. Additionally, Contoso Wireless provides 24/7 customer service and offers discounts and promotions on their internet services. Free installation and setup is available for new customers and a 30-day money back guarantee is included. Customers can sign up directly on the website or by calling the customer service line.
